long_desc.thetext:
"A reference conditional expression does not have to contain a poly expression as an operand in order to be a poly expression" - this is a recent spec change which is not addressed by org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.Expression.isCompatibleWith(TypeBinding, Scope)
Fix should be fairly simple and will follow shortly.
*** Bug 426361 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
